content.rendered:
Directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj

Written by Lokesh Kanagaraj. Rathna Kumar

Star Kamal Haasan (Agent Vikram / Karnan). Vijay Sethupathi (Santhanam). Fahadh Faasil (Amar). Narain (Bejoy). Suriya (Rolex). Kalidas Jayaram (ACP Prabhanjan). Chemban Vinod Jose (Jose). Santhana Bharathi (Agent Uppiliappan / Gym owner). Kumaravel (Agent Lawrence / Cab Driver). Vasanthi (Agent Tina / Servant). Gayathrie (Gayathri (Amar’s wife)). Swathista Krishnan (Prabanjan’s wife). Karthi (Dilli (voice)). G. Marimuthu (Commissioner of Police). Aruldoss (Rudra Prathap). Gowtham Sundararajan (Veerapandian). Maya S. Krishnan (Escort). Maheshwari Chanakyan (Santhanam’s first wife). Shivani Narayanan (Santhanam’s second wife). Nandhini Myna (Santhanam’s third wife). Ramesh Thilak (Elango, member of Vetti Vagaiyara). Vinodh (Munna, member of Vetti Vagaiyara). Sampath Ram (Member of Vetti Vagaiyara). Gokulnath (a member of Vetti Vagaiyara). Jaffer Sadiq (a member of Vetti Vagaiyara). Shreekumar (a member of the Black Ops Squad). Arunodaya (a member of the Black Ops Squad). Anish Padmanabhan (a member of the Black Ops Squad). Arjun Das (Anbu). Harish Uthaman (Adaikalam). Dheena (Kamatchi). Monica (Amudha). Hareesh Peradi (Stephen Raj)

Language Tamil. Hindi. Telugu. Kannada. Malayalam

Producers Disney. Kamal Haasan. Mahendran

Production Raajkamal Films International
